sections.text: Linux is used by major space programs such as NASA, ESA, and SpaceX?
As of 2018, Linux is used in the world’s top 500 fastest supercomputers?
Roughly 90% of Hollywood visual effects are dependant on Linux at some point in production?
Over 95% of Linux is written in the C language?
Linux wasn’t always open source? It only got a General Public Licenses in its 0.12 version in 1992.
